title: Smarter Sales Process in Dynamics CRM 2015 - Part 2: Revenue Estimation
description: Webcast notes from "A Non-Developer's Guide to Smarter Sales Processes in Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2015", as presented on MSDynamicsWorld.com on May 6th, 2015. The second part explores how the CRM 2015 calculated fields feature can be leveraged in simplifying the data entry and maintenance process for opportunity revenue estimates.
